attributes.additional_details:
I urge the government to cut all diplomatic ties with Bahrain following the alleged abuse of protesters, medical staff and others by the Bahraini authorities.

That the government continues to be weak on this issue, given it's whole-hearted support for the revolutions in Libya and Egypt is deeply hypocritical.

Human rights should apply to everyone, regardless of their nationality or our vested interests in the continuation of their governments.
